{{Refimprove|date=December 2009}} In [[software engineering]], a '''distributed design pattern''' is a [[design pattern (computer science)|design pattern]] focused on [[distributed computing]] problems.
==Classification== Distributed design patterns can be divided into several groups: * Distributed communication patterns * Security and reliability patterns * Event driven patterns
